narrations.speaker: Mouse
narrations.text: <color='#B0B0B0'>Twas the night before christmas, when all through the city, no creatures were stirring. Except a Mouse... Though if I had my way, I'd leave the creatures to their stirrings and go back to sleep. I'm getting too old for this.</color>

narrations.speaker: Cat
narrations.text: <color='#B0B0B0'>*purrs*</color> "Of course Miss. The details of your job are waiting for you on your laptop. I would start a coffee pot for you, but once again you're out. Also, if you have the time, I could really use a few more scratches behind the ears."

narrations.speaker: Mouse
narrations.text: <color='#B0B0B0'>C.A.T is your AI companion and assistant. As a contractor, you'd never be allowed a real animal companion, but you could at least afford the optional physical addon, and Cat was as cute as any real cat could be.</color>

narrations.speaker: Mouse
narrations.text:
<color='#B0B0B0'>Excluding a few upgrades along the way, she's been your constant companion ever since you purchased her with one of your first paychecks, a tidy 9 years ago. Sure, there are more advanced models available these days, but there's no way you'd upgrade.
Even if she does have a smart mouth on her sometimes...</color>

narrations.speaker: Mouse
narrations.text: "Why is a highly intelligent AI faux cat unable to scratch behind their own ears?"

narrations.speaker: Cat
narrations.text: "Why would I do it when I can get you to do it for me?"

narrations.speaker: Mouse
narrations.text: "Touche." <color='#B0B0B0'>You give the adorable android a few scratches behind her realistic fur ears and then lever yourself out of bed. Your laptop is already glowing on your desk with the new message.</color>

narrations.speaker: Mouse
narrations.text: "Why can't you order coffee for me when I run out?"

narrations.speaker: Mouse
narrations.text: <color='#B0B0B0'>You know damn well there's nothing in here</color>

narrations.speaker: Mouse
narrations.text: <color='#B0B0B0'>We should read the message from Manager Lyon before we leave</color>
